name: Mech Encounter
description:
Mech Encounter is an action mech combat game inspired by Mechwarrior.

This is an EARLY ALPHA version of Mech Encounter.
Everything you see is subject to change. I really appreciate feedback in all forms!

In this limited early alpha version you can:
- Fight 1v1 (or up to 2v2 with an experimental setting) against enemy mechs or mech variants of your own design!

- Design equipment and weapon loadouts and tweak performance by modifying engine, structure and armor types on the Orion chassis (more chassis coming later)

HOW TO PLAY

On the main menu, click 'instant action', assign a mech type to yourself and your opponent, and press play.

To win, destroy either your opponent's legs, center torso, or cockpit.

A more in-depth tutorial will be added to this page soon.

THE MECHBAY

To learn how to customize mech variants in the mechbay, click 'mechbay' on the main menu and press the 'help' button in the bottom left.

You may use these customized mech variants in the game, assigning it to yourself or your opponent.

A more in-depth tutorial will be added to this page soon.

CONTROLS

Unfortunately, controls can not be re-bound in the game at the moment. As a placeholder, see the list below. This list can also be found in-game in the settings menu.

MOVEMENT

Mouse | Turn torso

W | Increase throttle
S | Decrease throttle
A | Turn left
D | Turn right

X | Throttle 0%

Left Shift | Throttle 100%

Left Control | Throttle 100% Reverse

1 | Throttle 0%
2 | Throttle 20%
3 | Throttle 40%
4 | Throttle 60%
5 | Throttle 80%
6 | Throttle 100%

Space | Activate jump jets
F | Orient torso to body direction

Minus (-) | Invert current throttle

COMBAT

R | Target nearest
T | Clear target

Left Click / F1 | Fire group 1
Right Click / F2 | Fire group 2
Middle Click / F3 | Fire group 3
Mouse 4 / F4 | Fire group 4
Mouse 5 / F5 | Fire group 5
Mouse 6 / F6 | Fire group 6
Tilde (~) | Fire all groups

Caps Lock | Lock arms to torso
Scroll | Zoom in/out
G | Advanced zoom
Tab | Toggle enhanced vision mode
J | Override heat auto-shutdown
C | Flip player and target's wire-dolls

MISC

Escape | Open pause menu
